title: To establish the Commission on American Jobs.
content: Commission on American Jobs Act - Directs the Secretary of Commerce to establish a Commission on American Jobs. Requires the Commission to: (1) collect data on the outsourcing of jobs by specified types of companies of interest, (2) study such outsourcing's causes, (3) propose prevention measures. And (4) report to specified congressional committees. Requires such companies to report outsourcing data annually to the Commission.
